column2: CyberOptics Corp. engages in designing, developing, and manufacturing of precision sensing technology solutions. The company is headquartered in Golden Valley, Minnesota and currently employs 178 full-time employees. The firm's products and services are used in the surface mount technology (SMT), semiconductor and three dimensional (3D) scanning solutions and services markets. Its products are sold into the electronics assembly, dynamic random access memory (DRAM) and flash memory, and semiconductor fabrication capital equipment markets. The firm develops, manufactures and sells non-contact sensors and systems for process control and inspection, and general purpose metrology. The firm's product offerings are sold to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and end user customers in the SMT circuit board assembly, semiconductor and general-purpose metrology markets. Its OEMs incorporate the Company's sensor offerings into capital equipment serving these industries. The firm also sells standalone inspection systems that are sold directly to circuit board assembly companies.
